channel.title: How Do I Make An Item Unsellable To Stores?
channel.description:
I want to make items tradeable throughout players, but just so they can't sell those items to any store
Thanks, Play For Keeps

item.title: How Do I Make An Item Unsellable To Stores?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

search data/sellable.dat in item .java
add this

itemTradeable[itemid here] = false;
between
[b]} dataIn.close();[/b]
so it looks like
[b]}[/b] itemTradeable[itemid here] = false; [b]dataIn.close();[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make An Item Unsellable To Stores?
